thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 63 of 3060
thread.title: Stephen Toyer

author: Stephen Toyer
title: Stephen Toyer
text: I had booked a car for my holiday to Malta not realising i'd added full protection. Before receiving confirmation I tried to book again without the protection, inadvertently double booking. The rep that I spoke to on the phone was quick to cancel one and remove the full protection that I didn't require. Having to wait 5-7 days for the refund is not ideal but seems all companies have the same policy.
